meta.name: COSO/LM-2 Treasurer Vendor-Risk Memo (Example)
meta.description: Example UCC grammar module for a union vendor-risk memo. Research scaffold only.

authorities.name: U.S. Department of Labor LM-2 reporting

tasks.description: Draft a vendor-risk memo aligned to COSO controls and LM-2 stewardship expectations.

reasoning_steps: List applicable authorities and summarize requirements.
Evaluate internal controls and segregation of duties.
List evidence used and identify missing evidence.

validation_rules.expression: sections >= {Background, Scope, Risk Assessment, Internal Control Evaluation, Recommendations, Limitations}

disclaimers: This memo is prepared for internal governance purposes and does not constitute legal advice.
Ultimate responsibility for decisions rests with the organization’s designated officers.
